name: Entrance
description: A large room with a portrait on the wall
long_description: You are standing in the entrance of a large cabin. There is a portrait on the wall which depicts a noble looking elderly man The grim expression on his face spells trouble. There are doors to the north and east.

name: Sitting Room
description: A room with comfortable chairs around a fireplace
long_description: You are in a sitting room. There are comfortable chairs around a fireplace. There are doors to the south and east.

name: Kitchen
description: A room with a large stove and pots and pans
long_description: You are in the kitchen. There is a large wood-burning stove with pots and pans hanging above it. There are doors to the west and south.

name: Dining Room
description: A room with a long table and chairs
long_description: You are in the dining room. There is a long oak table with ornate chairs around it. There are doors to the north and west.
